UserPolicy given a current user with no person is not lockable
UserPolicy given a current user with no person can not reset the password

UserPolicy given:
    - a current user with a person
    - who does not have an hbx_staff_role
   is not lockable

UserPolicy given:
    - a current user with a person
    - who does not have an hbx_staff_role
   can not reset the password

UserPolicy given:
    - a current user with a person
    - who has an hbx_staff_role
    - has no kind of permission
   is not lockable

UserPolicy given:
    - a current user with a person
    - who has an hbx_staff_role
    - has no kind of permission
   can not reset the password

UserPolicy given:
    - a current user with a person
    - who has an hbx_staff_role
    - has a permission
    - the permission can not lock unlock
    - the permission can not reset password
   is not lockable

UserPolicy given:
    - a current user with a person
    - who has an hbx_staff_role
    - has a permission
    - the permission can not lock unlock
    - the permission can not reset password
   can not reset the password

UserPolicy given:
    - a current user with a person
    - who has an hbx_staff_role
    - has a permission
    - the permission can lock unlock
    - the permission can reset password
   is not lockable

UserPolicy given:
    - a current user with a person
    - who has an hbx_staff_role
    - has a permission
    - the permission can lock unlock
    - the permission can reset password
   can not reset the password
